GSP28jsbh1-4u:1196: anyathā dviṣanmāraṇamātrasya vidhyuddeśagatatvena vākyaśeṣāt dṛṣṭāntabalena tadavagataśaighryānavagame tataḥ pravṛttiviśeṣakarastutiviśeṣālābhaprasaṃgāt /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1197: tathāca pracchannatayā gṛhaṃ praviśya pracchannatayaiva nirgate caitre tasya pracchannatayā gṛhapraveśamātraṃ jānānamanyaṃ prati yathā devadatto gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ, tathaivāyaṃ nirgata iti vākyena devadattaniṣṭhayoreva praveśanirgamanayoḥ pracchannakṛtatvarūpagamyasādhāraṇadharmeṇopamānopameyabhāva ucyate, na tu devadattasyeva devadatteneti mukhya evopamānopameyabhāvaḥ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1200: yāgaparatve tu vākyaśeṣasthasyāyamityasya vyavahitayajñamātrakaraṇaparāmarśitvenānārjavaprasaṃgāt pakṣiyāgayoścāmukhya upamānopameyabhāvaḥ syāt;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1202: pakṣiṇi matsyādikarmakaṃ mukhyaṃ nipatyādānam, yāge bhrātṛvyakarmakaṃ māraṇameva /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1203: tadevāśaṅkitopasthitikatvaguṇayogena tathopacaritaṃ mukhyaṃ nipatyādānamiti tatprayojyaṃ pakṣiyāgayoramukhyameva sādṛśyam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1208: śyenaśabdasya yāganāmadheyatvasiddhaye pravṛttinimittākāṅkṣāyāṃ rūḍhasya tatra mukhyapravṛttinimittāsaṃbhave gauṇapravṛttinimittalā bhāyopakramākāṅkṣānusāreṇaiva vākyaśeṣe 'yamityasya
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1210: evopapattyopakramaparākramakhaṇḍanam) tadayuktam; ayamiti sarvanāmnā śyenādanyasyaivārthasya pratīyamānatvena śyenaparāmarśāyogādekaśyenaniṣṭhakriyayorupamānopameyabhāvānupapatteḥ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1211: sādhanatvena viniyuktavyaktyantaramādāyāyaṃśabdena parāmarśe śyenatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedasya pratīyamānasya bādhāpatteḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1212: yadyatra "yathā śyeno nipatyādatte evaṃ dviṣanta" mityetāvadeva syāttadekaśyenaniṣṭhakriyayoḥ saṃbhavedapi saḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1213: nacaitadasti, ata eva dṛṣṭānte 'pi ayaṃpadasattve tanniṣṭhakriyayorupamānopameyabhāvo durupapāda eva /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1218: evañca pravṛttinimittasamarpakatayā vatyarthakavākyaśeṣasya svādhyāyavidhyavagataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ labhyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1219: tava tu anyathāpi stutau vatyarthenaiva prarocitamabhyudayakārītyevaṃ niyamādṛṣṭakalpanāpattiriti
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1220: etacca yathaivaṃśabdābhyāṃ samabhivyāhṛtayoḥ śyonasarvanāmnorna bhinnārthatvena pratīyamānayorekārthatvakalpanetyādinā bhinnārthatvakathanena kaustubhepūjyapādaiḥ sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1221: (bimbapratibimbabhāvamūlakapūrṇopamālaṅkāravidhayā lakṣaṇāṃ vinaiva yāgastutyarthatvamarthavādasyeti nirūpaṇam) vinaiva lakṣaṇāmiti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1226: dravye tu svataḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt na tatstutiratyantamapekṣyata iti tatstutyā tatsādhyayāgastutikalpaneti viprakarṣo viśeṣa iti yāgastutyartha ityanena sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1227: (sandaṃśādināmatvavyavasthāpanam) evaṃ sandaṃśādipadānāmapi "yathā ha durādānaṃ sandaṃśenādadītaivametenādatta" ityarthavāde taptāyaḥ piṇḍagrahaṇasādhanalohamayasandaṃśenopamānadaśarnānnāmadheyatvaṃ jñeyam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1228: (yaugikatvena saha cāturvidhyaṃ nāmadheyatvaprakārasyeti nirūpaṇam) apivā nāmadheyamityatra kva guṇavidhitvaṃ kva nāmadheyatvamiti
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1229: koṣṭhaśodhanikārthamārambha iti pratijñātaṃ, tannāmatve prakāracatuṣṭayāpekṣatāṃ sūcayitumupasaṃharati --- tatsiddhamiti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1230: atra udbhidadhikaraṇe yaugikatvameva nāmatāsādhakaṃ, matvarthalakṣaṇā tu guṇavidhitvanirāsadvārā tadupodbalikā /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1231: tadāpattyabhāve 'pi phale yāge vā guṇavidhipūrvapakṣasya yaugikatvenaiva nirāsena nāmatāprasādhanenāyuktatvāt, matvarthalakṣaṇāpattimātreṇa somādau nāmatānaṅgīkārācca /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1243: yadyapi "athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa sarvajyoti"rityatra jyotirādipade prathamanirdiṣṭe dravyasya kratuvācakapadasamabhivyāhārābhāve tadaṅgatvena viniyogāyogāt prakaraṇena ca siddharūpasyāviniyogāt "etena
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1246: tathāpi tadanuvādena teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sahastradakṣiṇāyāśca vidhāne vākyabhedāpatteścitrāpadavadeva na guṇaparatvam, apitu nāmatvameva;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1249: pratipadyante, tadā vicāryanta iti vārtike tadvyapadeśādhikaraṇavicāryatvaṃ jyotirādipadānāmāpātataḥ pratīyamānamapi tadvyapadeśarahitatvenāyuktaṃ matvā jyotirādiśabdānāmudbhidādyadhikaraṇeṣu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ niveśo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyeṇa nyāyasudhākṛtā vyākhyātam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1253: aṣṭame tviha siddhameva nāmadheyatvam apūrvatādivicārārthaṃ prasaṅgāduktamiti na paunaruktyamiti
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1255: dvitīyapakṣe prāṇidravyakatvādagnīṣomīyavidhyantaḥ, siddhānte tu somadravyakaḥ somayāgavikṛtiriti spaṣṭatvānnoktam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1259: pūrvamubhayatra viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣe yāni dūṣaṇāni matvarthalakṣaṇādīni dattāni tānīha ākṣipyante
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1260: yadi hi yāgasya kārakatvaṃ syāt, tataḥ somādīnāṃ kārakāntarāṇāṃ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1263: ataśca tasmin sarvakārakāṇāṃ bhāvanāvadeva vinaiva matvarthalakṣaṇāṃ vinaiva ca vairūpyaṃ saṃbandhopapattiḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1264: yāgasya ca kriyātve 'pi saṃbandhasāmānyena bhāvanānvayo na virudhyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1266: ataścodbhidādiṣvapi sarvatra guṇavidhitvameva, vājapeyodāharaṇaṃ tu mūle
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1267: guṇasūtrānurodheneti prāpte --- pacatītyasya pākaṃ karoti pākena karotīti vivaraṇāddhātvarthasya karmatvakaraṇatvānyatarakārakatvenaiva bhāvanānvayaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1271: anyathā śrutyaiva phalaguṇayoryāgānvaye phalānvayārthaṃ yāgasyopādeyatvavidheyatvaguṇatvāni guṇānvaye coddeśyatvānuvādatvaprādhānyānīti viruddhatrikadvayāpatteḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1278: (tantrasaṃbandhenākṣepo yatra yatra pūrvanyāyaviṣayeṣu bhavati tasya sarvasyodāharaṇatvopapādanam) ādipadena yāgānuvādena guṇavidhānapūrvapakṣe
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1281: tantrasaṃbandheneha pūrvapakṣe tayorapi uddhārāt, na tu nyāyasudhākṛduktasyāpi pūrvanyāyacatuṣṭayasya grahaṇaṃ, tantrasaṃbandhena
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1282: pūrvanyāyākṣepāsaṃbhavāt, nahi yaugikatvanyāyena sāmānādhikaraṇyena coktaṃ nāmatvaṃ tantrasaṃbandhena nirākartuṃ śakyate, na vā citrādhikaraṇoktavākyabhedaḥ; guṇadvayasya yāgadvaye tantratvopapattāvapi
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1284: ato yatra yatra viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣastatrāpādyamānamatvarthalakṣaṇākṣepo yatra yāgānuvādena guṇavidhipūrvapakṣastatra phalapadānarthakyādidoṣākṣepaśceha kriyete /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1285: tatrāpi nāgnihotravākye viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣe 'pi bahuvrīhiṇaiva matvarthabhānānmatvarthalakṣaṇāyā aprasakternaitadākṣepa iti sūcayituṃ saṃbhavābhiprāyeṇa yatra yatreti vīpsopādānaṃ kṛtam ata eva tatprakhyānyaśāstrodāharaṇaṃ samidādivākyaṃ viśiṣṭavidhipakṣe matvarthalakṣaṇāprasakteḥ tadākṣepārthaṃ bhavatyevodāharaṇam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1286: (viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣe śyenavākyasyāpi etadadhikaraṇaviṣayatvasya kaustubhāvirodhenopapādanam) evaṃ śyenavākye viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣe
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1287: tantrasaṃbandhena matvarthalakṣaṇānirāse sati viśiṣṭayāgavidheḥ nirduṣṭatvāt śyenabhinnasya yāgasyopameyatopapatteḥ viśiṣṭhavidhigauravasya rūḍhyanurodhena somādivākya iva svīkāre bādhakābhāvāt pūrvādhikaraṇasyāpi ākṣepāttaduttaramapyārambho na virudhyate //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1288: etena --- matvarthalakṣaṇākṣepe udbhidadhikaraṇānantarameva asyārambhāpatteḥ asāṅgatyopapādanaṃ nyāyasudhākṛto --- nirastam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1289: yattu --- kaustubhe pūjyapādaiḥ tadvyapadeśanyāyastu naivoddhartuṃ śakyata ityuktam, tatsākṣāttantrasaṃbandhasya tannirāsākṣamatābhiprāyeṇa neyam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1290: ata eva nyāyasudhāyāṃ viśiṣṭavidhimaṅgīkṛtyaiva tadvyapadeśanyāyākṣepo darśitaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1291: (vājapeyavākye tatprakhyanyāyaviṣaye 'pi etannyāyapravṛttiriti prakāśakaustubhagranthayoḥ prauḍhivādatvopapādanam) yattu prakāśakāraistadanusāreṇa pūjyapādaiśca kaustubhe 'gnihotravākye
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1292: prasaktamatvarthalakṣaṇākṣepāsaṃbhave 'pi vājapeyodāharaṇe tatprakhyanyāyaviṣaye bahuvrīhyapekṣayā karmadhārayaṃ laghutvenāśritya tatra prasaktāyā matvarthalakṣaṇāyā ākṣepasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1295: tat peyaviśeṣaṇasya karmadhārayapakṣe pūrvanipātāpatteḥ svaravisaṃvādāpatteśca prauḍhivādamātram
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1299: peyasya ca vājaśabdavācyānnaviśeṣaṇatvopapatteḥ pānārhatvaviśiṣṭaikārthavidhānopapatteravākyabhedāttatprakhyānyaśāstratadvyapadeśayoścābhāvāt pūrvanyāyacatuṣṭayena guṇavidhitvanirāsāsiddhervairūpyāpattyā tannirāsāya vājapeyodāharaṇam - iti, tadapi na; tathātve udbhinnyāyāviṣayatvāyāgnihotrapade iva bahuvrīherāśrayaṇe matvarthalakṣaṇāyā aprasaktau tantrasaṃbandhena taduddhārārthaitadadhikaraṇaviṣayatvasyāpyanāpatteḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1302: ato yaugikatvavākyabhedatatprakhyanyāyānvinā yāni dūṣaṇāni matvarthalakṣaṇādīni tāni iha ākṣipya samādhīyanta iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1303: (dhātvarthasya bhāvanāyāṃ saṃbandhasāmānyena tatra ca guṇādīnāṃ karaṇatvādinā cānvayanirūpaṇapūrvakaṃ viśiṣṭavidhyasaṃbhavarūpapūrvapakṣopapādanam) tadanvayānupapatteriti /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1305: udbhidadhikaraṇe matvarthalakṣaṇāparihāreṇa guṇasya bhāvanāyāmeva kārakatvenānvayasya svayaṃ sādhitatvāt guṇayāgobhayaviśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhānāśrayaṇena yadgautavaṃ tadapyāśrayaṇīyaṃ syādityāha --- ubhayeti /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1308: yadyapi bhāvārthādhikaraṇe 'tiriktabhāvanā sādhayiṣyate; tathāpi tasya yatnarūpasya kārakājanyatvāt na tatra kārakāṇāṃ anvayaḥ saṃbhavati;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1311: ata e kārakānvayitvāt na tasya kārakatvam, apitu kriyārūpatvameveti yathaiva siddhānte sakalakārakānvitabhāvanā kriyārūpaiva satī pratyayenocyate, tathaiva dhātunā mamāpi kriyārūpa evārtha ucyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1315: ata eva etadanuśāsanabalādeva nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā saṃbandhasya padārthavidhayā bhānam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1316: naca kārakātiriktasya naiva bhāvanāyāmanvaya iti niyamo 'sti; "etasyaiva
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1318: athavā --- pradhānānvayānurodhena bhāvanāyāmeva kārakāṇāmanvayaḥ; tathāpi dhātvarthasya saṃbandhasāmānyenaiva tasyāmanvayādekasmin yāge guṇanirūpite
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1319: karmatve phalanirūpite ca karaṇatve aṅgīkriyamāṇe 'pi śābdabodhe tena tena
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1320: rūpeṇa pratītyabhāvāt na vairūpyāpattiriti karaṇatvenānavagamāt na tadanvayārthaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇādyāpattirityabhipretyāha --- yāgasyeti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1323: (udāharaṇāntaraparityāgena vājapeyodāharaṇāśayaḥ, tatra nyāyasudhāprakāśakārayormatakhaṇḍanaṃ ca) yadyapi vājapeyapade bahuvrīhyāśrayaṇe na matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaktiḥ, karmadhāraye peyapadasya pūrvanipātāpattiḥ; tathāpi bahuvrīherāśrayaṇe 'pi nānyapadārtho yāgaḥ pūrvapakṣe 'bhipretaḥ, yena vājapeyasubantenopāttaṃ dravyaṃ guṇatvena vidhīyata iti pūrvapakṣāśayena matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaktirna saṃbhavatītyucyate, kintu vājaṃ annaṃ peyam yasminniti surādravyavat yat karma tadevānyapadārthatvena vivakṣitamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1324: tathāca samāsenaivānyapadārthatayā surādravyaviśiṣṭakarmavidhānāśayena prācīnaiḥ prasajyanmatvarthalakṣaṇākavājapeyodāharaṇameva kimarthaṃ darśitamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharati --- vājapeyeti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1327: iti guṇasūtraṃ vājapeyasyānnadravyakatvena dravyasādṛśyasya balavatvādaiṣṭikavidhyantarasya pūrvapakṣe prāpte somadharmāṇāṃ dīkṣopasadādīnāmaprāptau "saptadaśadīkṣo vājapeyaḥ"
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1329: taddhi vājapeya eva saṃbhavati nānyatreti tadanurodhena vājapeyodāharaṇaṃ na tu nyāyasudhākṛtprakāśakāroktarītyetyarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1330: (dhātvarthasya saṃbandhasāmānyena bhāvanānvayanirāsena karmatvakaraṇatvādinānvayanirūpaṇapūrvakaṃ somena yajetetyādau sarvatra matvarthalakṣaṇā samarthanam) yadi saṃbandhasāmānyena yāgabhāvanayoranvayastato guṇaphalayorekasyāpyayogyatvādyāgānvayānupapattiḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1332: ato yāgakaraṇakabhāvanāyā eva sādhanākāṅkṣitatvena tattadrūpeṇaivānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1333: yadā pūrvoktavivaraṇānurodhādbhāvanāyāḥ dhātvarthātirekeṇa dhātvarthasya ca karaṇatvakarmatvānyatarakārakatvapratītistadā sutarāṃ tenaiva rūpeṇānvayaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1335: tadabhāve puruṣārthatvāvagatau vā karmatvenaiveti na saṃbandhasāmānyenānvaya iti karaṇatvena bhāvanānvaye pārṣṭhikānvayavelāyāṃ yogyatvāt phalenaivānvayaḥ syānnatu guṇena vidhisamabhivyāhāre satyapi
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1342: yugapat bodhe hi sādhyasya phalādeḥ, prayojanatvāt prādhānyaṃ, sādhanasya tu sādhyārthatvena pārārthyāt śeṣatvāparaparyāyaṃ guṇatvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1346: upādeyatvasya ca vidhyadhīnatvādvidheyatvāpādakatvamityevaṃ sādhanatve guṇatvopādeyatvavidheyatvaṃ trikaṃ, sādhyatve prādhānyoddeśyatvānuvādyatvaṃ ca trikamekasya yāgasya viruddham /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1349: karaṇatvāvasthāyāṃ ca jñātasya yāgasya guṇasaṃbandhavelāyāṃ uttarakālamanuvādājjñātajñāpanaviṣayatvākhyamanuvādyatvaṃ guṇaṃ prati /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1350: tadidaṃ yāgaguṇayorutpattividhikramāṅgīkāre pūrvaṃ yāgasyotpattiranantaraṃ guṇasyeti vairūpyam
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1351: tathā phalaṃ prati yāgasya śeṣatvāparaparyāyaṃ guṇatvaṃ guṇaṃ prati ca śeṣitvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyamiti śrūyamāṇasyaiva kramikaviniyogavidhiparatvāṅgīkāre vairūpyam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1352: tathā phalaṃ prati yāgasyopādeyatvaṃ guṇaṃ prati coddeśyatvamiti prayogavidhikramāṅgīkāre ca vairūpyaṃ ceti doṣāpattirityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1365: pravartanāviṣayatvākhyavidheyatvānuvādyatvasya ca spaṣṭarūpatayāsaṅkīrṇatvena jñātuṃ śakyatvādupādeyatvasya pāratantryāpādyatvalakṣaṇasya śeṣatve 'pi kāladeśādāvabhāvādata eva prādhānyāttadanyathānupapattyā kalpyamānoddeśyatvasya tatra
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1370: samādirūpadeśādeḥ kṛtivyāpyatve 'pi lokasiddhasamopajīvanenāpi prakṛtavidhyupapatteḥ paśvādivatprakṛtavidhiprayuktottaravihāradeśaprāpaṇād irūpakriyāntaravyāpyatvābhāvena prakṛtavidhiprayuktaviṣayatvābhāvā-
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1372: ata eva paśvādidravyasya tanniṣṭhaguṇādeśca vastuto lokasiddhatve 'pi
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1377: evaṃ puroḍāśakapālasyāpi vihāradeśe sthitasya hastagrahaṇādirūpakriyāviṣayatvena prakṛtavidhiprayuktatvaṃ jñeyam /

GSP28jsbh1-4u:2129: asti ca siṃhaśabdasya devadatte vaktrā prayujyamānatvānyathānupapattyā siṃhatvāropeṇa sa prayukta iti śrotrā kalpanāt tatsamanvaya iti, tadapi vede āropakapuruṣasyābhāvādayuktamiti nedṛśenāpi gauṇīlakṣaṇeneha gauṇyopapattyā stutyupapattiriti sarvathā nārthavādatvam stutyāpādakamāśrayituṃ śakyate ityagatyā bhaṅttkāpyekavākyatāṃ guṇavidhirevāyamiti bhāvaḥ //

GSP28jsbh1-4u:2631: 'vadeyadravadravyaviśeṣasyāśravaṇāt pramāṇāntaragamyavastusāmarthyāpekṣaṇe ca vedasya sāpekṣatayāprāmāṇyāpatteḥ tīkṣṇapuṣkaradhārasya ca struvasya kaṭhinadravyāvadāne 'pi sāmarthyasaṃbhavādāyasāvaṣṭaṃbhena struvahastayormāṃsāvadāne 'pi śaktyupapatteḥ koṭaravataśca svadhiterdravadravyāvadāne 'pi śaktisaṃbhavānugrāhakāpekṣāyāmapi ca nirapekṣasādhanatvāvighātādavyavasthāpūrvapakṣasya ca ---------
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2634: 'pi viṣayasyānyato 'navagatatvena vedasya prāmāṇyopapatteḥ tīkṣṇapuṣkaradhāreṇāpi struveṇa māṃsāvadānasyāśakyatvāt kevalenāpi struveṇa dravāvadānopapattāvāyasānugrāhakatvakalpane mānābhāvāttatkalpane ca nirapekṣasādhanatvavirodhasya duṣpariharatvāt svadhityādīnāṃ cā
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2635: jinavāsodhikaraṇanyāyena lokasiddhasyaiva grahaṇopapatteḥ koṭarakaraṇānupapattervyavasthaiva yuktetyevaṃ sunirasyatāṃ ca matvā siddhāntamevāha --------- vidheriti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2638: tena yatra darśapūrṇamāsādividherekādaśoktavyāyena sarvāṅgaviśiṣṭakarmaviṣayakatayā niścitatvena sandeho nāsti, tatra sāmarthyānusāreṇa prayājādiṣu śakyamātraviṣayatayā naiva saṅkocakalpanamiti vyatirekeṇa sūcitam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2641: (dravādipadādhyāhāraparaprācīnamatakhaṇḍanena vākyārthavarṇanam) atraca sāmarthyasahakṛto vidhireva struvādīnāmavadānādisādhanatvaṃ bodhayaṃstadanyathānupapattyā dravādiviśeṣarūpārthakalpanāyāmapi
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2642: tasyāśabdatvena śābdetarārthenānvayānupapatterdravādipadādhyāhāreṇa vedaikadeśatvarūpavākyaśeṣatvena sūtragataikadeśapadaṃ vyākhyāya dravādipadādhyāhāraḥ prācīnairuktaḥ, tasya sāmarthyānugṛhītāvadyatipadenaiva dravādikarmakāvadānoddeśyatvopapatteḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2646: vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣasaṃhatārthaviśiṣṭaikārthapratipādakapadasamudāyasya vākyatvāt tasyaca vākyārthapratipattyupāyabhūtakalpyapadārthavācipadābhāve sākāṅkṣatvenāparipūrṇasya viśiṣṭārthapratipādakatvāyogāt avadyateḥ karmatvākāṅkṣasya karmavācakapadaṃ vināparipūrṇatvāt dravādivācakapadādhyāhāra āvaśyaka eveti dhyeyam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2648: vidhau pūrvādhikaraṇoktanyāyāduddeśyaviśeṣe nirṇayastathā sāmarthyāduddeśyaviśeṣanirṇayamabhidhāya tadvadevehāpi vidheyasyāpi sāmarthyānnirṇayaṃ darśayituṃ anyadapyudāharati --------- evamiti (añjalipadārthanirṇayaḥ) atrāpi devatābhayaprārthanādau dvayoḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2652: (anyathānupapattisahakṛtasyaiva sāmarthyasya nirṇāyakatvāt puroḍāśāvadānena svadhitiprāptiriti nirūpaṇam) atraca na kevalaṃ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2656: ataśca puroḍāśāvadānasya hastenāpi saṃbhavāt kṣīṇārthāpatterna svadhitiprayojakatvaṃ kalpanīyamityapi jñeyam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2660: asmiṃśca vākye pradātavye ityapi padaṃ kaustubhe dhṛtaṃ tasyāhavanīyolmukena mahāvedyāstṛtabarhiṣonte dāhādutthito vaiśvānarognirartho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:2663: mānādhīnatvena meyasiddherāvaśyakasya pramāṇanirūpaṇasyottaratra nirūpaṇe hetutvasūcanadvārā vakṣyamāṇādhyāyārthān śiṣyoparamanirāsārthaṃ pratijānīte --------- ataḥparamiti //
